author: KATE BRUMBACK
title: Lawsuit seeks to block Georgia law that bans most abortions
Trump heads for big rebuke in Tuesdays elections

sentence: Trump's endorsement suffered a major loss in Georgia's gubernatorial race with incumbent Brian Kemp's (R ) victory over former Sen. David Perdue (R-Ga.).
author: Max Greenwood
title: Five takeaways from primaries in Georgia, Alabama and beyond
